sect2.title: CPU, Main Boards, and Video Support
sect2.para:
&debian; on &arch-title; supports the following platforms:
MIPS Malta: this platform is emulated by QEMU and is therefore a nice way to test and run &debian; on MIPS if you don't have the hardware.
Complete information regarding supported mips/mipsel machines can be found at the Linux-MIPS homepage. In the following, only the systems supported by the &debian; installer will be covered. If you are looking for support for other subarchitectures, please contact the debian-&arch-listname; mailing list.
